snippet: The authorities are mulling whether to charge a Boy Scout leader who knocked over an ancient desert rock formation.
abstract: Utah authorities are mulling whether to charge a Boy Scout leader who knocked over an ancient desert rock formation and the two men who cheered him on after they posted video of incident online; two of the men, who were leading a group of 14- to 16-year-old scouts on a trip, said the top of the rock formation was loose and they feared it was dangerous.
lead_paragraph: The authorities are mulling whether to charge a Boy Scout leader who knocked over an ancient desert rock formation.
